text: I just posted APKs that should have a decent try at the animations (review screen delete rotate/drop and Timeline items slide in from bottom). I tried to make some performance improvements, but I don't know if what I was able to do made a noticeable difference. Handling  the Camera API and doing computations on multiple bitmaps just takes a bit of processing time.
I tested both builds lightly, but the animations introduce quite a few opportunities for novel behavior, so I hope there aren't any huge new bugs (or we can fix them in the next round)
thanks marissa! have a good one.
you too karen! see you tomorrow.
